title: INtopBackup
description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INtopBackup, skipping any feeds with errors.

items.title: Kennedy Center vows to sue musician who canceled performance over Trump name change

items.title: ADHD drugs may work indirectly to boost attention
items.description: Drugs like Adderall and Ritalin appear to help children with ADHD by activating brain areas involved in alertness and motivation.

items.title: Attack on Kyiv shows 'Russia doesn't want peace', Zelensky says
items.description: The 10-hour missile and drone barrage directed at Ukraine's capital killed two people and left 32 injured, local authorities say.

items.description: Almost one million people were displaced when hostilities resumed earlier this month after the first truce broke.

items.title: Michigan hires former Utah coach Kyle Whittingham to lead the Wolverines
